type: Building Automation and Controls Service RFSO
short_summary: Provision of labor, goods, materials, etc. for HVAC unit servicing and calibration for DND 17 Wing.
description: Provision of all labour, goods, materials, tools, equipment, travel expertise, administration and supervision, and transportation of goods to perform servicing and calibration of HVAC units.
